Verses: 1 raajaavaagiya Thariyu Arasaanda Irandaam Varusham Aaraam Maadham Mudhalaanthedhiyile, Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Aagaai Ennum Theerkkadharisiyin Moolamaai Seyalththiyelin Kumaaranaagiya Serubaabel Ennum Yoodhaavin Thalaivanukkum, Yodhsadhaakkin Kumaaranaagiya Yosuvaa Ennum Pradhaana Aasaariyanukkum Undaagi, Avar Sonnadhu Ennavendraal:
2 indha Janangal Karththarudaiya Aalayaththaik Kattugiradharku Etrakaalam Innum Varavillai Engiraargal Endru Senaigalin Karththar Sollugiraar.
3 aanaalum Aagaai Ennum Theerkkadharisiyin Moolamaaik Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Undaagi, Avar Sollugiraar:
4 indha Veedu Paazhaaik Kidakkumpodhu, Neengal Machchuppaavappatta Ungal Veedugalil Kudiyirukkumpadiyaana Kaalam Idhuvo?
5 ippodhum Senaigalin Karththar Sollugiraar: Ungal Vazhigalai Sindhiththuppaarungal.

6 neengal Thiralaai Vidhaiththum Konjamaai Aruththukkonduvarugireergal; Neengal Pusiththum Thirupthiyaagavillai; Kudiththum Paripooranamadaiyavillai; Neengal Vasthiram Uduththiyum Oruvanukkum Kulirvidavillai; Kooliyai Sambaadhikkiravan Poththalaana Paiyile Podugiravanaai Adhai Sambaadhikkiraan.
7 ungal Vazhigalai Sindhiththup Paarungal Endru Senaigalin Karththar Sollugiraar.
8 neengal Malaiyinmel Erippoi, Marangalai Konduvandhu, Aalayaththaik Kattungal; Adhinperil Naan Piriyamaayiruppen, Adhil En Magimai Vilangum Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.

9 adhigamaai Varumendru Neengal Edhirpaarththirundhum, Idho, Konjam Kidaiththadhu; Neengal Aruththu Veettukkuk Konduvandhum, Naan Adhai Oodhippodugiren; Edhinimiththamendraal, En Veedu Paazhaaikkidakkumpodhu, Neengal Ellaarum Avanavan Than Than Veettirku Odippogireergale, Idhinimiththame Endru Senaigalin Karththar Sollugiraar.
10 aadhalaal Ungalmel Irukkira Vaanam Paniyaip Peyyaamalum, Boomi Palanaik Kodaamalum Poyitru.

11 naan Nilaththinmelum, Malaigalinmelum, Dhaaniyaththinmelum, Pudhu Dhraatcharasaththinmelum, Enneyinmelum, Boomiyil Vilaigira Ellaavatrinmelum Manusharinmelum, Mirugangalinmelum, Kaippaadu Anaiththinmelum Varatchiyai Varuviththen Endraar.

12 appozhudhu Seyalththiyelin Kumaaranaagiya Serubaabelum, Yodhsadhaakkin Kumaaranaagiya Yosuvaa Ennum Pradhaana Aasaariyanum, Janaththil Meedhiyaana Anaivarum Thangal Dhevanaagiya Karththarudaiya Saththaththukkum, Thangal Dhevanaagiya Karththar Anuppina Aagaai Ennum Theerkkadharisiyinudaiya Vaarththaigalukkum Sevikoduththaargal, Janangal Karththarukku Munbaaga Bayandhirundhaargal.
13 appozhudhu Karththarudaiya Thoodhanaagiya Aagaai, Karththar Thoodhanuppiya Vaarththaiyinpadi Janangalai Nokki: Naan Ungalode Irukkiren Endru Karththar Sollugiraar Endraan.

14 pinbu Karththar Seyalththiyelin Kumaaranaagiya Serubaabel Ennum Yoodhaavin Thalaivanudaiya Aaviyaiyum, Yodhsadhaakkin Kumaaranaagiya Yosuvaa Ennum Pradhaana Aasaariyanudaiya Aaviyaiyum, Janaththil Meedhiyaana Ellaarudaiya Aaviyaiyum Ezhuppinaar; Avargal Vandhu, Thangal Dhevanaagiya Karththarin Aalayaththile Velaiseydhaargal.
15 thariyu Raajaavin Irandaam Varusham Aaraam Maadham Irubaththunaalaanthedhiyile Idhu Nadandhadhu.
